## Integer {.t3}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/numeric/numeric_integer.mp4){fig-align="center"}
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}

- **Enabled.** Default. Restricts input to integer values.
- **Disabled.** Allows numbers with and without decimals. No limit on the number of decimal places.

:::

::::

## Number of decimals {.t3}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/numeric/numeric_number_of_decimals.mp4){fig-align="center"}
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}

- **When empty.** No limit on number of decimal places.
- **When filled.** Maximum number of decimal places allowed.

:::

::::

## Use 1000 separator {.t3}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="70%"}
![](assets/numeric/numeric_thousand_separator.mp4){fig-align="center"}
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}

- Affects display on tablet.
- Does not affect how data are stored.

:::
